actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.
short_title: Tax Relief for Unemployed Workers Act of 2001

summary.text: Tax Relief for Unemployed Workers Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement to include unemployment compensation in gross income and the provision concerning the voluntary withholding on unemployment benefits.

titles.title: Tax Relief for Unemployed Workers Act of 2001
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.
